item.title: John Lennon & The Harlem Community Choir & The Plastic Ono Band & Yoko Ono - Happy Xmas - Key of A - DrJillReese
item.description: Play along video for the song Happy Xmas by John Lennon & The Harlem Community Choir & The Plastic Ono Band & Yoko Ono from the channel DrJillReese. Chords used in the song: A, A7, Bm7, D, D7, E7, Em, Em7.

item.title: John Lennon - Imagine - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Imagine by John Lennon from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: Am, C, Cmaj7, Dm, E7, F, G, G7.
